title: Nobody
description: EVERYBODY'S GOING TO FALL IN LOVE WITH NOBODY, George's imaginary friend.When they decide to fix breakfast together, Nobody suggests chocolate meat loaf, but they settle on pancakes, and cook up a storm . . . and a mess. Eventually order is restored, and pancakes are served. And Nobody eats more than anybody. Filled with clever wordplay that tells a story true to so many childrenâ€™s experience, NOBODY will soon have many friends.
author: Liz Rosenberg
